snippet.title: Forecursed Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Link to Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3053850/Forecursed/

Survive or become the monster in this Cursed game of tag. Escape the evil entity that roams around and kills whoever it possesses. Dying is not the end though as lost souls will become ghouls; creatures with unique abilities that haunt the remaining survivors until there’s only one remaining.

Join the Forecursed Discord: https://discord.gg/UGfgnQUG4V

Forecursed news on X: https://x.com/Suroxify
